thread.title: SunshineGrl
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by SunshineGrl

author: SunshineGrl
title: SunshineGrl
text: I love using this site to compare gift cards, but unfortunately, some of the vendors aren't always using valid cards. Make sure to check the balance right away and ask for a refund if there are any problems. I've never had trouble getting a refund, but it is a hassle all the same. I wish that GCG would account for the available coupons when listing the discounts. I know other sites do this for other things (like bigwords.com for books/textbooks) so I don't see why GCG can't do the same thing. I use GCG all the time and at nearly every store I go to. After deciding what I'm going to purchase, I buy an electronic card before getting in line and have it ready to present by the time I get to the cashier. It's such a money saver!
